Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS_00>Please speak to me again when you
are ready.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Are you ready to attempt the ceremony<sp:5:0:0> so
that you may hear the <clr:0000>story<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Ah. <sp:5:0:0>It is you.<sp:0:4:0>I see you are once again prepared to
attempt the ceremony <sp:5:0:0>and hear the story
of this island.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>There will be a delay before the ceremony
can begin. <sp:5:0:0>Please wait here until the time
bell tomorrow <clr:0000>morning<clr:ffff>. We can start then.<sp:0:4:0>Is that acceptable?
Talk_0042:
But you must not <clr:0000>set foot on any surface<clr:ffff>
other than the roof of this temple during
the ceremony.
Near_0003: This island has a rich story.
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>I will now tell you the <clr:0000>story<clr:ffff> of the
Great Sky Island as promised.
Talk_0015: <sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Do you want to hear the story again?
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Understood. <sp:5:0:0>Perhaps in the future you
will be ready. Speak to me again when
this happens and we will begin.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>I see that you want to try once again to
complete the ceremony.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>We have brought you into our confidence.<sp:0:4:0>Please take good care of the token I have
given you for completing the ceremony.
Talk_0047:
Do you want to hear an explanation of
the ceremony?
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_01>Let us wait for the islands to rise precisely
at the time of the 7:00 AM time bell.
Talk_0019: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>Thank you for waiting.<sp:5:0:0> The time has come.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Light the <clr:0000>three fires<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> Then return here
before the next time bell rings <clr:0000>12 hours
from now<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Understood. <sp:5:0:0>Let us wait for the islands to
rise precisely at the time of the morning-
time bell.
Talk_0021: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_01>It is now time for the ceremony to begin.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>You want to withdraw? <sp:5:0:0>I see. Please wait
a moment.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Please speak to me again if you change
your mind.
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>The <clr:0000>Temple of Time<clr:ffff> and the land it sits
upon were once found on the surface of
the world.<sp:0:4:0>This has changed. Its land and the lands
surrounding it now float in the sky.<sp:0:4:0>There is a reason for this. The hero who
will defeat the Demon King will one day
awaken at this very site.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_01>The site must be kept safe from the
Demon King and his followers. <sp:5:0:0>It was
therefore raised high into the skies.<sp:0:4:0>The tremendous power of the sages
accomplished this feat long ago.
Talk_0028: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>That is the story of the Great Sky Island.
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>The sages who raised this land into the
sky directed me to give this token to the
one who heard my story.<sp:0:4:0>It is now yours.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Notice>Your feet touched the ground. <sp:5:0:0>Let us
start over.
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Notice>Your time is up. <sp:5:0:0>The bell has rung again.<sp:5:1:0>
Let us start over.
Talk_0032: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>You have left the island. <sp:5:0:0>Let us start over.
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>I am sorry. You have failed the ceremony.<sp:5:0:0>
I hope you will attempt it again.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>I have been waiting for you.<sp:0:4:0>My purpose is to conduct a <clr:0000>ceremony <clr:ffff>to
test the strength of any visitors.<sp:0:4:0>Those who pass are told the <clr:0000>story <clr:ffff>of the
Great Sky Island.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I sense you are qualified to attempt
this ceremony.<sp:0:4:0>Please inform me when you are prepared
to begin.
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>You must light the <clr:0000>three fires <clr:ffff>on this
island<sp:5:0:0> and then return here <clr:0000>within the
time limit<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_00>You have <clr:0000>12 hours<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The sounding of the <clr:0000>time bell<clr:ffff> will signal
the start of the ceremony. <sp:5:0:0>It will end with
the sound of the next bell.<sp:0:4:0>This concludes my explanation.
